content.rendered:
This FREE Guide will help you solve the most common problems with GitOps.

In this guide, we will describe several gaps and issues in current GitOps tools, and the biggest challenges when adopting GitOps workflows. Next, we will look at ideal scenarios, the features that tools should provide, and the standard that we are implementing in what we call GitOps 2.0.
